Package optimizer

Class Optimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • optimizer.Optimizer
  • public class Optimizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for optimization of the network
    constructor of this class:
    Optimizer(NodeStruct[], PipeStruct[], CommercialPipeStruct[], GeneralStruct, EsrGeneralStruct, EsrCostStruct[], PumpGeneralStruct, PumpManualStruct[], ValveStruct[]) optimizer
    Functions of this class are :
    Below-mentioned functions are used for debugging purpose

      logd(String) logd
      logi(String) logi
      logw(String) logw
      loge(String) loge


      validateNetwork() validateNetwork

    • Constructor Detail

      • Optimizer

        public Optimizer​(NodeStruct[] nodeStructs,
                 PipeStruct[] pipeStructs,
                 CommercialPipeStruct[] commercialPipeStructs,
                 GeneralStruct generalStruct,
                 EsrGeneralStruct esrGeneralProperties,
                 EsrCostStruct[] esrCostsArray,
                 PumpGeneralStruct pumpGeneralProperties,
                 PumpManualStruct[] pumpManualArray,
                 ValveStruct[] valves)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs an instance of the Optimizer class.
        Parameters:
        nodeStructs - an array of NodeStruct objects representing the node properties
        pipeStructs - an array of PipeStruct objects representing the pipe properties
        commercialPipeStructs - an array of CommercialPipeStruct objects representing the commercial pipe properties
        generalStruct - a GeneralStruct object representing the general network properties
        esrGeneralProperties - an EsrGeneralStruct object representing the ESR general properties (can be null if ESR optimization is disabled)
        esrCostsArray - an array of EsrCostStruct objects representing the ESR cost properties (can be null if ESR optimization is disabled)
        pumpGeneralProperties - a PumpGeneralStruct object representing the pump general properties (can be null if pump optimization is disabled)
        pumpManualArray - an array of PumpManualStruct objects representing the manual pump properties (can be null if pump optimization is disabled)
        valves - an array of ValveStruct objects representing the valve properties
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is an error in the construction of the optimizer

      • validateNetwork

        private int validateNetwork()
        Check whether the network structure is valid or not
        Returns:
        int
        1 => Valid Input: Acyclic graph
        2 => Valid Input: Cyclic graph
        3 => Invalid Input: Disconnected graph (i.e. nodes disconnected from the network)
        4 => Invalid Input: Source Head is less than Source Elevation

      • getTotalCapacity

        private double getTotalCapacity()
        Calculates and returns the total capacity required for the network.
        Returns:
        the total capacity required for the network

      • Optimize

        public boolean Optimize​(java.lang.String runTime)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Optimize the network. And, if done successfully, the results are stored in three ArrayLists, namely resultPipes, resultCost and resultPumps.
        Parameters:
        runTime - a string variable denoting the run time of the network
        Returns:
        whether network was solved successfully results are ready (`true`) or not (`false`)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case of any error/problem or to convey any status information

        public static boolean checkFileExist​(java.lang.String filePath)

        in that particular filePath
        Parameters:
        filePath - a string variable which denotes the path to the file
        Returns:
        boolean
        true => if the file exists false => if that file does not exist and created that file

      • generateUniqueFileName

        private static java.lang.String generateUniqueFileName​(java.lang.String baseDirectoryPath)
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Generate unique filename based on the time at which the function was called and a random number, such that no file with the same name exists in `baseDirectoryPath`.
        The filename format is: "yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss.SSS_{i}_{RandomNumber}.R" Range of i = [0, 9_99_999] Range of RandomNumber = [10_00_001, 99_99_999]
        Parameters:
        baseDirectoryPath - path to the directory for which a unique filename is to be generated
        Returns:
        unique filename which does not exist
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if unique filename generation fails

      • findFileHashInHex

        private static java.lang.String findFileHashInHex​(java.security.MessageDigest digest,
                                                  java.io.File file)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method return the digest/hash (in hexadecimal format) of the file passed
        REFER: https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/how-to-generate-md5-checksum-for-files-in-java/
        Parameters:
        digest - hashing algorithm to be used
        file - file object whose hash is to be found
        Returns:
        Hex representation of the hash
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file read operation fails

      • createNetworkFile

        private java.lang.String createNetworkFile()
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the MD5 hash of the newly created network file provided everything goes properly
        Returns:
        String
        "0-NetworkFileMD5Hash.R" if everything was fine and this is the first request for this network
        "2-NetworkFileMD5Hash.R" if everything was fine and a request for this network was received in the past
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if network file creation fails due to any reason

      • createGamsModel

        public void createGamsModel​(java.lang.String amplFilePath,
                            java.lang.String gamsFilePath,
                            java.lang.String modelname)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a GAMS model based on the provided input files and parameters.

        gamsFilePath - The path to the GAMS output file to be created.
        modelname - The name of the GAMS model.

      • printSetsAndParametersAndModels

        void printSetsAndParametersAndModels​(java.lang.String amplFilePath,
                                     java.lang.String gamsFilePath,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nodes,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pipes,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arcs,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arcsLength,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> diameter,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> elevation,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pressure,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> demand,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pipeCost,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pipeRoughness,
                                     java.lang.String source,
                                     java.lang.String modelName)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Prints the sets, parameters, and models to a GAMS output file based on the provided input and source.
        Parameters:
        amplFilePath - The path to the AMPL input file.
        gamsFilePath - The path to the GAMS output file.
        nodes - The list of nodes.
        pipes - The list of pipes.
        arcs - The list of arcs.
        arcsLength - The list of arc lengths.
        diameter - The list of diameters.
        elevation - The list of elevations.
        pressure - The list of pressures.
        demand - The list of demands.
        pipeCost - The list of pipe costs.
        pipeRoughness - The list of pipe roughness values.
        source - The source information.
        modelName - The name of the model.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs while writing to the output file.

      • printParameters

        private void printParameters​(java.io.BufferedWriter out,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arcsLength,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> diameter,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> elevation,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pressure,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> demand,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pipeCost,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pipeRoughness,
                             java.lang.String source)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the parameters to the specified output writer.
        Parameters:
        out - The output writer to write the parameters.
        arcsLength - The list of arcs lengths.
        diameter - The list of pipe diameters.
        elevation - The list of node elevations.
        pressure - The list of node pressures.
        demand - The list of node demands.
        pipeCost - The list of pipe costs.
        pipeRoughness - The list of pipe roughness values.
        source - The source node.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs while writing to the output writer.

        arcsLength - The list to store the lengths of arcs.

      • launchCalculateNetworkCost

        private void launchCalculateNetworkCost​(java.lang.String networkFilePath)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Launch "CalculateNetworkCost_JaltantraLauncher.sh" and wait for 2 seconds. If the process exits within 2 seconds, then log it (saying that we need to check into this matter) and return.
        Parameters:
        networkFilePath - path to the network file which is the be solved
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if `SOLVER_ROOT_DIR` directory does not exist, or function is unable to start the launcher process, or exception is thrown by `process.wairFor(...)`

      • checkSolverResultStatus

        private int checkSolverResultStatus​(java.lang.String pathToNetworkSpecificDirectory)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Check the execution status of "CalculateNetworkCost.py"
        Returns:
        int
      • -1 if "pathToNetworkSpecificDirectory/0_status" file does not exist
      • -2 if solver status has unknown/unhandled value (refer code and documentation of "CalculateNetworkCost.py", and update this method)
      • 1 if solver is "running"
      • 2 if solver has "finished"
      • 3 if solver has "successfully finished"
        • Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if "launch_error" occurred

      • extractSolverResult

        private boolean extractSolverResult​(java.lang.String pathToNetworkSpecificDirectory)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Extract solution for a given network and store it in:
         • resultPipes
         • resultCost
         • resultPumps
        Parameters:
        pathToNetworkSpecificDirectory - path to the directory which was created by CalculateNetworkCost.py to store all the data related to a network file given to it to solve
        Returns:
        true if solver result was successfully extracted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any one of the below condition occurs:
         • result file does not exist
         • failure to read the result file
         • solver failed to find the solution due to some reason
